title: Wave Fizz Ambient Water, Sparkling Or Cold Water Dispenser
item_description:
Wave Fizz Ambient Water, Sparkling Or Cold Water Dispenser

  • Manufacturer: BLUPURA
  • Model Number: WAVE FIZZ 60 VOL
  • Width: 19”
  • Length: 12.5”
  • Height: 18”

  • Up to 18 litres of chilled, ambient or sparkling water. Dispensing into branded glass bottles you can serve your clients/guests in style. Seller States That This Lot Is in Working Conditions. Dolly Is Not Included. Key Not avalible
